snippet: Penn State has made notable progress in its adoption of reforms meant to protect children from sexual predators, the university’s independent monitor said in an annual report.
abstract: Independent monitor says Penn State has made notable progress in its adoption of reforms meant to protect children from sexual predators.
lead_paragraph: Penn State has made notable progress in its adoption of reforms meant to protect children from sexual predators, the university’s independent monitor said in an annual report.

headline.main: Progress at Penn State Involving Reforms
